#mauve

Hex-y colors in the terminal

##Usage

```javascript
var mauve = require('mauve');

/* Set individual colors */
mauve.set('happy','#FF9933');

/* Set themes */
mauve.set({
	armor: "#4d1b7b",
	gown: "#0ff800"
});

//Apply colors just like in colors
console.log('This is a happy color'.happy);
```
